title: Batman Christmas featuring Noel and 18 more stories
description:
With the new Batman game out and taking place at Christmas time I thought it might be a fun idea to do this in case others were looking for something like it. I have compiled a collection of Batman stories that are all directly tied to Christmas (though I believe one is actually New Years now that I think about it). The numbering order is something I did for myself but then I decided I might as well leave it that way and let people remove the numbers if they don't like my personal reading order; it's mostly chronological, but not completely.

The comics included are these:
Batman Noel
Batman 09
Batman 15
Batman 33
Batman 219
Batman 239
Batman 247
Batman 285
Batman 309
Legends of the Dark Knight 79
Batman 598
Detective 826
Batman Adventures Holiday Special
DC Superstar Christmas Special (1980)
Brave and the Bold 184
Long Halloween Chapter 03
Batman Black& White 03 (3 stories)

In each of these, anywhere that there are multiple stories in an issue, only the Christmas segment has been included in this torrent.

Please seed as long as you can once you download. I will try and leave my computer on as much as possible for people to be able to get this file, but occasionally I will be shut down. If no one else is seeding and you don't seem to be getting anything from me, don't worry, I should be online relatively soon. My connection speed is pretty good so you should be able to get these decently quick I would think.

If you have any questions please ask in the comments section. Enjoy!
